summary: Diamond smugglers kidnap the girl of his dreams, and Ernest P. Worrell goes to Africa to confront them and rescue her.
cast: Jim Varney|Linda Kash|Jamie Bartlett|Clare Marshall|Washington Xisolo|Robert Whitehead|Zane Meas|Charles Pillai|Sello Sebotsane|Frank Opperman|Dan Robbertse|Frank Pereira|Tony Caprari|Ian Yule|David Germond|Anthony Fridjhon|Nicola Chapman|John R. Cherry III|Michael Stumm|Allan Fyfe|John Whiteley|Jeffrey Michael|Fats Bookholane|Sello Dlamini|Robin Smith|Hector Rabotabi|Philip Notununu|Greg Hind
director: Director: John R. Cherry III (as John Cherry)
title: Ernest Goes to Africa
